about: I'm a full stack developer focused on building practical solutions for real-world problems.
I began working in market research, lived in Excel, shuffled into data science with R/Python to automate data products, and now build scalable web apps like this with Go & Docker on Google Cloud.
I enjoy building efficient applications/services to help businesses run smoother. Feel free to reach out if I can help!
